item.title: NASA Researchers Discover New Types of Gamma-ray Emissions in Tropical Thunderstorms - The Daily Galaxy --Great Discoveries Channel
item.description:
1. NASA Researchers Discover New Types of Gamma-ray Emissions in Tropical Thunderstorms  The Daily Galaxy --Great Discoveries Channel
  2. Mysterious form of high-energy radiation spotted in thunderstorms  Nature.com
  3. How do scientists study lightning? With a spy plane and some big storms : Short Wave  NPR
  4. Via NASA Plane, Scientists Find New Gamma-ray Emission in Storm Clouds  Science@NASA
  5. Spy plane observes how storms produce radioactive clouds and antimatter  EL PAÍS USA

item.title: I asked a pro photographer for the best iPhone camera settings — my pics are now better than yours
item.description: We asked a pro photographer for the best iPhone camera settings, and this is the step-by-step process to achieve mobile shooter nirvana.

item.title: OpenAI funding round values company at $157 billion
item.description: OpenAI has completed its funding round of $6.6 billion. Despite inner turmoil, the ChatGPT maker just closed the largest VC round of all time.

item.title: Amazon just dropped a new Fire HD 8 tablet — and it's already 45% off for October Prime Day
item.description: Amazon's best early October Prime Day tablet deals include a steep discount on the updated Fire HD 8 and a new all-time low for Apple's M4 iPad Pro.

item.title: Facebook cracks down on celebrity deepfake scams after $43 million in losses for Australians
item.description: Australians reportedly lost some $43 million to social media scams on Facebook. A major problem involved celebrity deepfakes.

item.title: Shop the best home security deals ahead of Amazon's October Prime Day
item.description: Home security systems and video doorbells are already on sale at Amazon ahead of October Prime Day, including tons of Blink products.

item.title: Gen Z is shopping more on Snapchat than TikTok or Instagram, study shows
item.description: Social media marketing drives purchases, with Gen Z leading the charge, especially on Snapchat.

item.title: How to connect your iPhone to a satellite to send messages
item.description: This feature gives you a lifeline if you've lost cell or WiFi service.

item.title: Microsoft's latest Windows update is causing issues for some gamers
item.description: The latest Windows 11 update from Microsoft has some compatibility issues with some video game titles.

item.title: The best early October Prime Day TV deals are on Fire TVs, of course
item.description: Prime Day is a great time to buy a TV on sale. Ahead of October Prime Day, 55- through 75-inch 4K Fire TVs already have solid discounts.

item.title: Get Microsoft Visual Studio and coding training for just $56
item.description: Get Microsoft Visual Studio Professional 2022 and a comprehensive coding training bundle for just $55.97 through October 27.

item.title: Looking for an affordable Dyson Airwrap dupe? Get the Shark FlexStyle $50 off ahead of October Prime Day.
item.description: As of Oct. 2, the Shark FlexStyle air styling and drying system is available for $249.99, down from $299.99. That's $50 off our favorite Dyson Airwrap dupe.

item.title: Amazon has two of Mashable's favorite laptops for video editing on sale ahead of October Prime Day
item.description: Grab the best early Prime Day laptop deals on the Acer Swift X 14 and M3 MacBook Pro. Save up to $400.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy deals are slowly heating up as October Prime Day nears
item.description: Shop the best Samsung Galaxy deals ahead of October Prime Day. Our top picks include Galaxy Tabs, Galaxy Buds, and more.
